channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 15 stylish home office payday finds under $50 at IKEA that finally fix clutter
item.description: I went searching IKEA for the cheapest home office gear to keep your workspace organized, and this is what I found.

item.title: AirPods 4 with ANC drop to $119
item.description:
Every time Apple's AirPods 4 with active noise cancelation go on sale I have the same thought: maybe I made a mistake. Don't get me wrong, I love my regular AirPods 4, but the noise canceling aspect makes their sister pair very enticing. Take now, for instance, when the AirPods 4 with ANC are on sale for $119, down from $179. The 34 percent discount brings them to only $4 more than the standard AirPods 4 current sale price and below their usual $129. While we've seen the ANC model as low as $99, the $119 price tag is the best deal we've seen so far this year.
Apple released its fourth-gene...

item.title: Forget Dutton Ranch — Yellowstone fans need to stream this disturbing crime thriller to see one star in a role they’ve ‘never done before’
item.description: Dutton Ranch is my most anticipated TV show of 2026 — but this Yellowstone star’s ‘messy’ and ‘terrifying’ new thriller is more disturbing than the wild west.

item.title: The Daredevil: Born Again season 2 trailer is pure sensory overload — and it confirms when the Marvel TV show will return on Disney+
item.description: Marvel has revealed the official release date and first trailer for Daredevil: Born Again season 2.

item.title: Risotto raises $10M seed to use AI to make ticketing systems easier to use
item.description: Designed to autonomously resolve help desk tickets, Risotto has raised $10 million in seed funding in a round led by Bonfire Ventures.

item.title: You’ll be able to change the color of Virtual Boy games on Nintendo Switch Online
item.description: Following the initial reveal last September, Nintendo has released a new trailer detailing which Virtual Boy games will be available to Switch Online subscribers starting on February 17th alongside revamped headsets, and which titles will launch later this year. The company also revealed some new features for the games, including the option to change the […]...

item.title: Samsung’s TriFold phone will cost $2,899 in the US
item.description: The phone's display unfolds twice to reveal a 10-inch display, which is the largest screen ever on a Galaxy phone.

item.title: eSIM adoption could reach a major milestone in 2026 - but can providers cope with demand, especially in IoT?
item.description: 2026 will see a 30% rise in eSIM devices, but they're for IoT not smartphones, so a whole new model is being rolled out.

item.title: Nintendo va sortir des jeux inédits en 2026 sur la console qui a le plus flop de son histoire
item.description: Non seulement, Nintendo va ressortir son casque de VR Virtual Boy, mais la firme va aussi sortir des jeux inédits, développés dans les années 1990.

item.title: Réseaux sociaux interdits aux moins de 15 ans : la Commission européenne donne son feu vert, mais…
item.description: Oui, la France a le droit d'interdire l'accès aux réseaux sociaux aux moins de 15 ans. Mais seule la Commission européenne aura la compétence pour faire appliquer cette interdiction à Tiktok, Instagram, Snap et les autres grands réseaux sociaux, a rappelé la Commission européenne lors d'un point presse ce mardi 27 janvier, dont voici les points principaux....

item.title: LG's new subscription service could turn the world of expensive OLED TVs on its head — here's what I think as a deals expert
item.description: LG and Raylo have announced a new partnership that enables you to hire a new LG OLED TV, soundbar or gaming monitor for as little as £15 per month, but is this offer really as good as it sounds?

item.title: Independent auditors confirm Surfshark’s VPN infrastructure as secure
item.description: Surfshark has completed a comprehensive independent security audit of its network infrastructure. SecuRing found no critical vulnerabilities, reinforcing the provider's claims of resilience against sophisticated cyberattacks.

item.title: Tesla’s robotaxis are cheaper than Waymo, but the wait times are longer
item.description: Tesla's robotaxis are not robotaxis in the sense that they're not fully driverless and still feature safety monitors with access to a kill switch in case anything goes wrong. But the automaker is shaking things up with its approach to pricing, according to a new analysis of the nascent market. Obi, an app that aggregates […]

item.title: Yahoo Scout looks like a more web-friendly take on AI search
item.description: Yahoo's big AI play is, in many ways, actually a return to the company's roots. Three decades ago, Yahoo was known as "Jerry's guide to the world wide web," and was designed as a sort of all-encompassing portal to help people find good stuff on an increasingly large, hard-to-parse internet. In the early aughts, the […]

item.title: Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni’s Phia raises $35M to ‘make shopping fun again’
item.description: “We’re on the cusp of a completely new way of shopping,” Gates told TechCrunch.

item.title: Airtable gets into the AI agent game with Superagent
item.description: SuperAgent is Airtable's first standalone product in its 13-year history, and signals both the company's ambitions and the reality of the current AI moment: every serious software player is racing to prove they can deliver on agents.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Wednesday, January 28 (game #1465)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Wednesday, January 28 (game #962)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Wednesday, January 28 (game #696)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: A European AI challenger goes after GitHub Copilot: Mistral launches Vibe 2.0
item.description: Mistral AI, the French artificial intelligence company that has positioned itself as Europe's leading challenger to American AI giants, announced on Tuesday the general availability of Mistral Vibe 2.0, a significant upgrade to its terminal-based coding agent that’s the startup's most aggressive push yet into the competitive AI-assisted software development market.The release is a pivotal moment for the Paris-based company, which is transitioning its developer tools from a free testing phase to a commercial product integrated with its paid subscription plans. The move comes just days after Mis...

item.title: I’m tired of predictable heist thrillers – but here’s why the trailer for Tuner has restored my faith in the genre
item.description: Leo Woodall stars in this new thriller about a piano tuner turned criminal, and I already think it's a genius concept.

item.title: Un premier test montre que ChatGPT n’est pas un bon médecin
item.description: Les chatbots se piquent maintenant de donner des conseils médicaux à partir des données collectées au fil des ans par les applications de suivi de la santé. Le seul problème, c'est qu'ils racontent n'importe quoi.

item.title: Verizon issues rare refund to Boston users who are locked out of key TV channels to show that 'we have their back'
item.description: Verizon customers in Boston have been given refunds as major TV channels continue to be unavailable.

item.title: La PS5 Slim avec lecteur de disque revient à un super prix pour la fin des soldes d’hiver
item.description: La console de Sony, la PlayStation 5 dans sa version Slim avec lecteur Blu-Ray, revient dans la valse des soldes. On la trouve en ce moment à 475 euros au lieu de 549 euros chez Pixmania.

item.title: « Ridicule » : pourquoi le bracelet Whoop sans écran fait polémique à l’Open d’Australie de tennis
item.description: Lors de l'Open d'Australie de tennis, plusieurs joueurs ont dû retirer leur bracelet Whoop de leur poignet.

item.title: L’héritier du BMW C1 arrive enfin : 12 900 € pour faire de l’interfile sans casque
item.description: La startup allemande XYTE Mobility lance le XYTE ONE, un véhicule électrique à trois roues mêlant l'agilité d'un scooter avec la sécurité d'une voiture électrique. Accessible avec un simple permis B et dispensant du port du casque, il arrivera sur le marché de la micro-mobilité urbaine dès le premier trimestre 2026.

item.title: Pinterest to lay off 15% of staff to redirect resources to AI
item.description: Pinterest says it's "reallocating resources to AI-focused roles and teams that drive AI adoption and execution" and "prioritizing AI‑powered products and capabilities."

item.title: L’État français va bloquer Google Meet, Zoom et Microsoft Teams
item.description: La France veut aller au bout de la démarche avec son application Visio. Elle bloquera dans le courant de l'année l'accès aux solutions étrangères comme Google Meet ou Microsoft Teams.

item.title: TurboTax Deluxe has been discounted to $45 ahead of tax season
item.description: With the spring approaching, it's time to start thinking about how you'll file your taxes. Unfortunately, with the recent demise of Direct File, there isn't a free, government-provided alternative to TurboTax in 2026, and you'll need to look to other federal programs, including IRS Free File, to file your paperwork. If you don't qualify for Free File, chances are you'll need to dish out cash for Intuit's software. And while we hate to suggest you give money to a company that has spent decades lobbying to ensure America's tax system remains a nightmare, we can at least save you some money if Tu...

item.title: Amazon will pay customers $309 million to settle ‘no hassle returns’ lawsuit
item.description: Amazon is resolving claims that it incorrectly processed returns with a proposed settlement valued at over $1 billion, as reported earlier by Reuters and Bloomberg Law. The settlement includes $600 million in refunds, along with an additional $309.5 million in payments to affected customers. Initially filed in 2023, the class action lawsuit claims that while […]...

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem en 4K jusqu’à 120 fps sur PS5 Pro ? Capcom le promet
item.description: Akishi Nakanishi, directeur de Resident Evil Requiem, affirme que le jeu sera beau et fluide sur PS5 Pro.

item.title: Samsung dévoile le prix du Galaxy Z TriFold et c’est exactement ce à quoi on s’attendait
item.description: Après une première annonce du produit et des prises en main par la presse, Samsung confirme le prix de son premier smartphone pliant en trois parties. Un tarif tout juste sous les 3 000 dollars, totalement prohibitif.

item.title: Windows 11 se débarrasse définitivement de cette technologie historique utilisée par de nombreuses entreprises
item.description: De nombreux modems ne fonctionnent plus depuis la dernière mise à jour de Windows 11. Et pour une fois, ce n'est pas un bug, mais bien une décision délibérée de la part de Microsoft.

item.title: I’m a laptop expert, so trust me when I say this Dell 14 Plus 2-in-1 deal at Best Buy is an essential payday purchase — at just $649.99, it’s nearly half the price Dell sells it for
item.description: Dell’s 14-inch Plus 2-in-1 laptop has dropped to just $649.99 at Best Buy and comes with an Intel Core Ultra 7 processor, 16GB of DDR5 memory, and a 1TB SSD.

item.title: How a Microbe Tunnels Its Way Through an Insect Gut—It’s Weirder Than You Think
item.description: Some microbes can squeeze through tight spaces by wrapping themselves in their flagellum—the tail-like structure they use to move. Also, how adorable are those little guys?

item.title: The Fed seeks a pivot to interest rates at upcoming meeting after DOJ subpoenas and political drama
item.description: This week’s meeting will be overshadowed by the Justice Department’s criminal investigation of Fed chair Jerome Powell. After two weeks of intense political and legal scrutiny, the Federal Reserve will seek to make this week’s meeting about interest rates as straightforward and uneventful as possible, though President Donald Trump probably still won’t like the result.The central bank’s interest rate-setting committee is almost certain to keep its key short-term rate unchanged at about 3.6%, after three straight quarter-point cuts last year. Fed Chair Jerome Powell said after December’s meeting...

item.title: Luminar receives a larger $33 million bid for its lidar business
item.description: A new leading bidder has appeared in the Luminar bankruptcy case: Redmond, Washington-based MicroVision, which beat out Quantum Computing Inc.'s bid by $5 million.

item.title: Experts flag around 800,000 Telnet servers exposed to remote attacks - here's why users should be on their guard
item.description: Hackers are hunting for vulnerable endpoints to deploy Python malware.

item.title: China’s Moonshot releases a new open-source model Kimi K2.5 and a coding agent
item.description: The company said that the model was trained on 15 trillion mixed visual and text tokens.

item.title: E-Book Checkouts of ‘Heated Rivalry’ Shoot Up 529% in NYC After Mayor Encourages People to Stay Home and Read the Gay Hockey Book
item.description: Boys' Love is the only light left in our messed-up world.

item.title: AMD could be working on a way to minimize RAM price hike pain — by bundling Ryzen CPUs and DDR5 memory
item.description: An official collaboration between AMD, V-Color and Cooler Master hints at more possible bundle deals in the future.

item.title: ‘Just start the thing’: Alex Honnold on climbing skyscrapers, national parks, and human potential
item.description: Whether he’s climbing skyscrapers in Taiwan or working to build the Honnold Foundation, free solo climber and activist Alex Honnold remains an optimist. He sat down with Fast Company to talk about why a good outlook is essential—both for his sport and in the fight for the planet. Honnold also reflects on education, human potential, […] Whether he’s climbing skyscrapers in Taiwan or working to build the Honnold Foundation, free solo climber and activist Alex Honnold remains an optimist. He sat down with Fast Company to talk about why a good outlook is essential—both for his sport and in the fig...

item.title: Pinterest cuts workforce by around 15 percent to focus on AI
item.description: Pinterest is planning to lay off hundreds of workers and reduce its office space to reallocate resources for its artificial intelligence initiatives. In a regulatory filing posted Tuesday, Pinterest says the reduction is expected to impact "less than 15 percent" of its current workforce, and that the layoffs should be complete by September 30th, 2026. […]...

item.title: Quelle BYD électrique choisir en 2026 ? Notre guide des meilleurs modèles
item.description: BYD est le premier vendeur de voitures électrifiées au monde et domine assez largement son marché local, à savoir la Chine. Le constructeur est aussi présent en Europe avec une gamme de produits un peu plus restreinte qu'à l'autre bout du monde, mais il y a de quoi trouver son bonheur.

item.title: « La voiture électrique est tout simplement un produit supérieur » : pourquoi Volvo enterre le thermique pour 2026
item.description: On entend souvent que la transition électrique patine. Pas chez Volvo. Anders Bell, le CTO, vient de lâcher une bombe technique : la plateforme SPA3. Fini les adaptations, place à une intégration verticale totale, du logiciel aux méga-castings. La promesse ? "Le changement technologique le plus profond de l'histoire de l'automobile".

item.title: Could the MCU Already Be Looking for a New Black Panther?
item.description: Plus, Sam Raimi wants in on a new 'Darkman'.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Trifold U.S. Price Is Not at All Surprising
item.description: You already knew the foldable phone was going to be really expensive.

item.title: The Samsung Trifold will cost nearly three grand
item.description: Samsung's much-anticipated Galaxy Z Trifold goes on sale on this Friday, January 26th, and the price is every bit as steep as we'd feared: $2,899, which gets you 512GB of storage and a phone that kind of wants to be a tablet all the time. The Trifold first premiered in Korea late last year, so […]

item.title: Node-based design tool Flora raises $42M from Redpoint Ventures
item.description: Flora's node-based design tool is being used by companies like Pentagram and Lionsgate.

item.title: The Galaxy Z TriFold finally has a US price and launch date — and it's Samsung's priciest foldable yet
item.description: Samsung’s ambitious triple-folding phone is finally priced in the US. The Galaxy Z TriFold launches on January 30 for $2,899 and unfolds into a 10-inch AMOLED display.

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy Z Trifold will cost $2,900 in the US
item.description: As promised, Samsung is bringing its Galaxy Z Trifold smartphone to shoppers in the US. The unique foldable goes on sale on January 30. The phone was announced along with its select markets' sale dates at the close of 2025. We didn't have price information for Samsung's domestic market at that time, and even though we were anticipating the Galaxy Z Trifold to cost a bundle, the actual cost is more absurd than we'd guessed. In reality, getting your hands on this slim triple-screen smartphone will run you $2,900. Putting aside the ludicrous expense, this smartphone is pretty dang cool. After his...

item.title: Why rituals, not resolutions, create intentional leadership
item.description: Rituals help leaders cut through distraction, manage tradeoffs, and show up consistently for others.

item.title: Intel’s Panther Lake CPUs Make the Best Case for ‘Fake Frames’ in Gaming
item.description: The new Core Ultra Series 3 chips and XeSS 3 AI upscaler can juice up frame rates on laptops, but handhelds may benefit the most.

item.title: TikTok, YouTube, and Meta are headed to court for a landmark trial over social media addiction
item.description: For the first time, the tech giants will face a jury to argue their case. Three of the world’s biggest tech companies face a landmark trial in Los Angeles starting this week over claims that their platforms—Meta’s Instagram, ByteDance’s TikTok, and Google’s YouTube—deliberately addict and harm children.Jury selection starts this week in the Los Angeles County Superior Court. It’s the first time the companies will argue their case before a jury, and the outcome could have profound effects on their businesses and how they will handle children using their platforms. The selection process is expec...

item.title: 'The next chapter begins' — Blizzard announces several showcases that will share plans for the future of World of Warcraft, Overwatch, Diablo, and Hearthstone
item.description: Blizzard Entertainment has announced a series of special showcases that will reveal the plans for its four biggest franchises, World of Warcraft, Overwatch, Diablo, and Hearthstone.

item.title: ELEGOO Debuts Its First Multicolor FDM 3D Printer With the Centauri Carbon 2 Combo
item.description: Bringing your creative ideas to life has never been easier.

item.title: Truth and AI in Minneapolis
item.description: When federal agents killed Alex Pretti in Minneapolis on Saturday morning, video of the shooting - from lots of people, and lots of angles, with wildly varying levels of quality - immediately began to fly around the internet. This is what always happens in times like these, and there have unfortunately been a lot of […]

item.title: Apple et Google distribuent des dizaines d’apps qui dénudent les femmes
item.description: Il n'y a pas que Grok qui dénude les femmes sans leur consentement. Il existe des dizaines d'applications distribuées par les boutiques d'Apple et de Google qui proposent ce type de « service », en contradiction totale avec les politiques d'Apple et de Google.

item.title: Hurry! This 16-inch touch screen Dell laptop is just $749.99, a huge saving of $320 — and with an Intel Core 7 processor, 16GB DDR5 memory, and a 1TB SSD, it's perfect for a payday splurge
item.description: Dell’s 16-inch touch screen laptop is now just $749.99 and comes with an Intel Core 7 processor, 16GB DDR5 memory, and a 1TB SSD.
